title: rail simulator: Official Expansion Pack
description:
The first official expansion for the hugely successful Rail Simulator adds the Californian route from the US release of Rail Simulator and the iconic British 08 Shunter, plus extra rolling stock, scenarios and more!

Take to the Rail Simulator tracks in a brilliant new expansion pack, developed by RSDL - part of the original Rail Simulator development team. The pack features a newly-developed Class 08 Shunter. This re-creation of the long-lived workhorse of Britains railways has been eagerly anticipated by virtual train fans. Rail Simulator Official Expansion pack also includes the entire 80 miles of Californias Cajon Pass route - featured in the US release of Rail Simulator - extra rolling stock, new scenarios and more!


Mount using any virutal drive (i used clone virtual drive)

start and run

does not require a cd key or crack
